strings:
<voice_0x0100176B><se_low>*: Welcome to the Dragovian Sanctuary.
We Dragovians are capable of existing in
two forms: human and dragon.

<voice_0x0100176C><se_low>*: I am Chen Mui, a Dragovian Elder.
I'll be your guide here.
<voice_0x0100176D><se_low>Chen Mui: It has been many hundreds of years since humans last set foot within the Sanctuary.
<voice_0x0100176E><se_low>Chen Mui: Your sudden appearance may shock some Dragovians. That is why I would like to accompany you.
<voice_0x0100176F><se_low>Chen Mui: You may feel uncomfortable at being escorted, but I pray for your understanding in this matter.
